name: Mission Imporksable
description:
This is me (Seoras), Calum Blane, Sandy Macdonald and Kate Morrison's game for Ludum Dare 32. You must infiltrate the facility, avoiding guards and poisoning them with bacon. Enjoy!

Use WASD to move, SPACE to drop bacon, and CTRL to pick up dropped bacon.

Note: The game music may take a while to start the first time you play.
